replies.body: all entries between March 27th and April 27th are valid.
Woobox keeps freezing on my pc, can you confirm if my entry made it? :O
got your entry thanks =D

"Your entry must be appropriate for players of all ages: League’s rated M, so nothing too risqué or of a violent nature"

Not a single drop of blood?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} RIP my whole piece is based of Vaynes story where she puts a silver bolt through someones head... I shouldve read the rules first... feelsbadman
Mine is kinda bloody as well, but i just wanna know where should we draw the line, 'cuz the stories are kinda violent. So it'd be fair to have some bloody thing in the illustrations. right?
Some violence is okay. As long as it doesnt enter the realm of gore or overly graphic it will be fine
Thank you =D
Wait, so is Lucian not Demacian?
Lucian is Demacian I believe, however he did not have a new Bio and story with the last Demacia story launch.

Hey Maraudaur,
can't wait to finish my artwork.
I was wondering what does it mean when it says 'artwork featured in client' what does that mean?

It means there will be an article like this - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/LF8WE04b-fanart-spotlight-shiafira

Which will be featured in a client tile for a day or two, like below. (when you click the client tile it will direct you to the article)

http://imgur.com/XGXXf6E.jpg

Hope that clears things up.
Oh thats cool. thank you.
Is it possible to make it a 2 - 3 panel comic for the competition?
yeah, that would be cool

Hey just clarifying, you've said "Your artwork can be drawn, painted, or digital -- as long as it's a two-dimensional artwork submitted digitally, it counts." but then also said "Paint, draw, sketch, collage - _whatever medium you want_, so long as the end result is a beautiful _illustration_." I work with polymer clay and was planning on creating a 3D scene using clay, but I'm not sure if that's aloud.

Hey,

I can see how those two phrases can be confusing. Sorry about that. "Your artwork can be drawn, painted, or digital -- as long as it's a two-dimensional artwork submitted digitally, it counts." is the more accurate one, I will edit the post to reflect that.

Don't let that stop you from making the awesome 3D scene though, would love to see it!
Players that submit amazing artwork work but didn't make it into the top three.
Ahhh I see, well Whizza got a big surprise in their account then =P I will get your prize to you tomorrow.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=fBvbg4EB,comment-id=00190000,timestamp=2017-05-02T11:59:22.255+0000)
>
> Ahhh I see, well Whizza got a big surprise in their account then =P I will get your prize to you tomorrow.

First he takes my W forcing me to use 2 V's...  then my RP.... Vengeance shall be mine Whizza
I realllly hope that one day you both cross paths on the Fields of Justice. You should have the RP in your account as well now =D

Hey, i know this is a little late, but I was wonder if you guys received my artwork through Woobox.
Thanks!
We have your entry =D
Hi just wondering if my submission went through or not. I was quite unsure what I was supposed to do after the submission form :/ I'll be rather devastated if it didnt
we have your entry

Hi there I hash-tagged my submission really last night (just before midnight AEST) and realised this morning my instagram was set to private. Wonder if you will still accept it. The time of posting should be there. My insta is lol.empyre.

Hi, I will add it to the list as a one time exception. In future please make sure you check everything is good before the due date =P it helps to not submit literally on the dot of when submissions close.
Are you able to email me the image? I can't seem to grab it off Instagram. Maraudaur@riotgames.com

At work now. I will do that asap. Sorry took me so long to prepare the artwork :(

OK I have emailed it. let me know if you received it. Thanks so much.
At work now. I will do that asap. Sorry took me so long to prepare the artwork :(

Hi, is there any way to check whether the submission went through or not? Because the post-submission page loaded rather slowly and when i tweet the given link in the post-submission page it just leads to the submission form.

Thanks!
We have your entry =D
Ah phew! Thanks for the quick reply! :)
Do the new champions Xayah and Rakan count or only those above like Garen, Lux etc?
Xayah and Rakan don't count.
Ah bother didn't see this till 25th 2 days left ah well
Hi, do we have to write the title of the short story that we drew from or have the story part written in our artwork? Thanks!

it shouldnt be written in the artwork but there is a form field to copy paste the story part along with your image. If you are posting on instagram you can also include the story part in the description.
Can we sketch the artwork on a piece of paper, and then take a photo, then submit it digitally? Is that okay?
yep thats okay =D
lol

Just had a quick question about the size of the artwork! The suggested minimum dimensions are of a landscape artwork (if assuming that the first listed number is width and then height). Is it okay to draw it it with portrait size/length? Mine is currently 1660 x 2488px
thats fine
